resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74032</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>3efa689b-3be1-4e17-b869-0409604d68e6#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A kiválasztó szervrendszer</string>
            <string language="en">The secreting organ-system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das absondernde Organ-System</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'organe-système de sécrétion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O órgão-sistema secreting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il organo-sistema di secrezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το εκκρίνοντας όργανο-σύστημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El o'rgano-sistema de secreción</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az ember kiválasztó szerveinek elhelyezkedése a testben</string>
            <string language="en">Localization of human's secreting organs in the body</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">kiválasztás,  vese,  húgyvezeték,  húgyhólyag,  húgycső,  </string>
            <string language="en">secretion, kidney, urinary channel, urinary bladder, urethra</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lokalisation der absondernden Organe des Menschen 
im Körper</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Localisation des organes de sécrétion de 
l'humain dans le corps</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Localization de órgãos secreting do ser humano 
no corpo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Localizzazione degli organi di secrezione 
dell'essere umano nel corpo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εντοπισμός των εκκρίνοντας οργάνων του ανθρώπου στο 
σώμα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Localización de los órganos de secreción del 
ser humano en el cuerpo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Absonderung, Niere, urinausscheidende Führung, 
urinausscheidende Blase, Urethra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sécrétion, rein, canal urinaire, réservoir souple 
urinaire, urètre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">secretion, kidney, canaleta urinary, bexiga urinary, 
urethra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">secrezione, rene, scanalatura urinaria, vescica 
urinaria, urethra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έκκριση, νεφρό, ουρικό κανάλι, ουρική κύστη, ουρήθρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">secreción, riñón, canal urinario, vejiga urinaria, 
uretra</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

        <metaMetadata>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
